title: Beautiful Boy
description: "Mischief, giggles, fun & love...that's what little boys are made of"... A poetic, motivational children's book, in which each page presents a fun-filled atmosphere that celebrates the wonder every boy brings to the world.So, come along to uncover the mystical mysteries deep within...& what will you find? Read the book from beginning to end! (Ages 3-7)
author: J.L.  Hunt
